name: Krab Warriors
description:
A smash-like game combined with king of the hill!

Objective

Stay inside the Shell more than 10 seconds! Can you manage to dodge all of the other player's attacks at once?

Controls

Left Joystick  - Move

A - Jump

X - Attack

Options

ESC - Quit

Keys 2-4 - Toggle between 2, 3, and 4 player mode

R - restart level

F - Toggle fullscreen 

Made for GGJ2019 by Dustin Poveda (art), Gilberto Araya (art), Coco (sound effects) and me (code).
